meta_description: Our mission it to bring people together to explore the art and stories of Southern California artists. Visit the Oceanside Museum of Art.
hours_text:
# Visit

  * 

  1. 

__

__

# WELCOME TO OCEANSIDE MUSEUM OF ART

Located in a burgeoning coastal city along the cultural corridor between Los Angeles and San Diego, Oceanside Museum of Art (OMA) explores new, relevant, and historical art of Southern California. 

Like art itself, OMA is always fresh, sometimes edgy, sometimes traditional, and frequently unexpected. The OMA experience stimulates imagination, presents new ideas, and challenges the familiar in a welcoming environment for those new to art, longtime museum-goers, artists, art students, or simply the curious.

### HOURS

**Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday**   
_11:00am–5:00pm _**  
**__

**First Friday of Every Month**  
_Extended hours 11:00am–8:00pm_

***EARLY CLOSURES**

* **November 22** , closing at 2:00pm for the Exhibition Celebration. [Join us](https://htru.io/SMoJ)!

**HOLIDAY HOURS**

**Early Closings**  
Christmas Eve and New Year’s Eve closing at 2:00pm

**Closed**  
New Year’s Day, Easter, July 4, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day

### ADMISSION

**We can't wait for you to visit OMA! Getting your tickets is easy. Just purchase them at the front desk when you arrive!**

**Adult** $15

**Seniors 65+** $10

**Oceanside Museum of Art Members** FREE

**NARM and ROAM Members** FREE

**Youth 17 and Under** FREE

**College Student** FREE with ID

**Active Military and Dependents** FREE with ID

### **Special Free Admission Days**

collections_text:
## Oceanside Museum of Art | OMA

2025-26 Artist Alliance Biennial

[2025-26 Artist Alliance Biennial](https://oma-online.org/biennial25/)

[Celebrating 53 standout works showcasing the depth, diversity, and vision of OMA’s Artist Alliance community. On view through March 8, 2026.](https://oma-online.org/biennial25/)

[Learn More ](https://oma-online.org/biennial25/)

Modern Simplicity: The Architecture of Irving J. Gill in Oceanside

[Modern Simplicity: The Architecture of Irving J. Gill in Oceanside ](https://oma-online.org/modern-simplicity/)

[Explore the legacy of visionary architect Irving J. Gill, whose modern, minimalist designs helped shape Oceanside’s architectural identity and continue to inspire contemporary design today.](https://oma-online.org/modern-simplicity/)

[Learn More ](https://oma-online.org/modern-simplicity/)

Surf Art: Exploring Southern California's Coastal Culture

[Surf Art: Exploring Southern California's Coastal Culture](https://oma-online.org/surf-art/)

[From resin and murals to surfboards, sculpture, and fabric, artists expand surf culture into new realms.](https://oma-online.org/surf-art/)

[Learn More ](https://oma-online.org/surf-art/)

Rent OMA

[Host Your Next Event at OMA](https://oma-online.org/rentals/)

[Make your occasion unforgettable in a truly unique setting. Delight your guests with local exhibitions, contemporary architecture, and interactive touches like mini paint workshops, festive crafts, or live art experiences.](https://o...
